mean_cn: n. 研究生；  adj. 大学毕业后的，研究生的
mean_en: a person who already holds a first degree and who is doing advanced study or research; a graduate student
sentence: I have completed two years of postgraduate study and still have one year to go.
sentence_trans: 我已经完成了两年的研究生学习，还要再读一年。
word_etyma: post在后面 + graduate毕业 → postgraduate大学毕业后的
